abstract: Wells Fargo may replace the Tattersall Advisory Group as manager of two Evergreen fixed-income funds after they posted large losses.
snippet: Wells Fargo may replace the Tattersall Advisory Group as manager of two Evergreen fixed-income funds after they posted large losses.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo may replace the Tattersall Advisory Group as manager of two Evergreen fixed-income funds after they posted large losses.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Eyes Shake-Up at 2 Evergreen Funds
